alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sheridan County through 630 PM MDT... At 544 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Hay Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rushville, Highway 250 crossing the Niobrara River and Walgren Lake State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 86 and 93. Highway 250 between mile markers 35 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
